description: Schema that describe a list of Pokemon as found in the Pokedex
title: List of Pokemon

___hp.description: Max endurance points of the Pokemon

___weight.description: Weight of the Pokemon in kg

___type.description: List of comma separated values of Pokemon type as referenced in pokedexgo-types table

___attack.description: Max attack points of the Pokemon

___legendary.description: Indicates that the Pokemon is lengendary or not

___name_en.description: Name of the Pokemon in english

___weaknesses.description: List of comma separated values of Pokemon type as referenced in pokedexgo-types table

___defense.description: Max defense points of the Pokemon

___cp.description: Max combat points of the Pokemon

___immunities.description: List of comma separated values of Pokemon type as referenced in pokedexgo-types table

___resistances.description: List of comma separated values of Pokemon type as referenced in pokedexgo-types table

___friend.description: How many km to get a candy

___name_fr.description: Name of the Pokemon in french

___height.description: Height of th Pokemeon in meters

___region_id.description: Identifier of the region as referenced in pokedexgo-regions table
